onboarding.battleArenaDesc: This is your competitive arena! Here you can create and join real-time sports trivia battles against players worldwide. Let's explore how to dominate the competition!
onboarding.howBattlesWorkDesc: Head-to-head trivia competition where speed and accuracy matter! Answer questions faster and more accurately than your opponent to win ranking points.
onboarding.createFirstBattleDesc: Set up your battle challenge here! Choose your sport and difficulty level. Once created, your battle becomes visible to all players who can join and compete.
onboarding.chooseYourSportDesc: Select from Football, Basketball, Tennis, and more! Each sport offers unique trivia covering rules, history, famous players, and current statistics.
onboarding.pickChallengeLevelDesc: Easy (beginners), Medium (casual fans), or Hard (experts). Higher difficulty levels give more ranking points but require deeper sports knowledge!
onboarding.launchYourBattleDesc: Click to create your battle! You'll enter a waiting room where you can invite friends or wait for random opponents. Battles start automatically when someone joins.
onboarding.joinExistingBattlesDesc: Browse all available battles created by other players. Click any battle to instantly join and start competing! The list updates automatically.
onboarding.battleActionsManagementDesc: Join battles (green button) or Cancel your own battles (red button). You can have up to 3 active battles waiting. Choose wisely!
onboarding.stayUpdatedDesc: Click refresh to manually update the battle list, though it updates automatically. Perfect for ensuring you see the latest available battles!

battles.createDesc: Start by creating a new battle. Choose your preferences and challenge other players!
battles.sportsDesc: Pick your favorite sport. Each sport has its own unique set of questions and challenges.
battles.difficultyDesc: Select the difficulty level that matches your expertise. From easy to hard, test your knowledge!
battles.waitingDesc: View available battles to join, or host your own and wait for opponents to challenge you.

ui.topPlayersRanked: Top players ranked by points (wins, win rate, streaks, and consistency)

ui.createFirstBattleToSee: Create your first battle to see it here!
ui.battleCreatedSuccessfully: Battle created successfully! Redirecting to waiting room...
ui.upTo3ActiveBattles: You can have up to 3 active battles waiting. Please wait for someone to join or cancel some battles first.
ui.battleWaiting: battle waiting. Please wait for someone to join or cancel it first.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about Head2Head

whatIsHead2Head.question: What is Head2Head?
whatIsHead2Head.answer: Head2Head is a global sports community platform where fans can engage in daily sports discussions, participate in real-time trivia battles, and share their opinions on the biggest debates in sports. Our platform features daily rotating sports debates, live quiz battles, and a vibrant community of sports enthusiasts.

howItWorks.question: How does Head2Head work?
howItWorks.answer: Head2Head combines daily sports debates with trivia battles. Each day, you'll find new debates across different sports where you can vote, comment, and discuss with other fans. You can also challenge other users to real-time trivia battles to test your sports knowledge. All your activities contribute to your profile stats and global ranking.

tournaments.question: How do daily debates work?
tournaments.answer: Every 24 hours, we feature new sports debates across different categories like football, basketball, tennis, and more. You can vote on your picks, engage in discussions through comments, and see how the community votes. Each debate includes real-time vote tracking and nested discussion threads.

isFree.question: Is Head2Head free to use?
isFree.answer: Yes, Head2Head is completely free! You can participate in daily debates, vote on picks, engage in discussions, and battle other players in sports trivia without any cost. We focus on building a passionate community of sports fans.

mobileApp.question: Can I use Head2Head on mobile devices?
mobileApp.answer: Yes! Head2Head is fully responsive and works seamlessly on all devices. Whether you're using a phone, tablet, or desktop, you can enjoy all features including daily debates, real-time voting, and community discussions.

contact.question: How can I contact support?
contact.answer: For any questions, feedback, or support needs, you can reach our team through the contact form on the website or email us directly. We're always here to help improve your experience on Head2Head.
